pkgmetadata.longdescription: Clustering with Matrix Gaussian and Matrix Transformation Mixture Models // Provides matrix Gaussian mixture models, matrix transformation mixture models and their model-based clustering results. The parsimonious models of the mean matrices and variance covariance matrices are implemented with a total of 196 variations. For more information, please check: Xuwen Zhu, Shuchismita Sarkar, and Volodymyr Melnykov (2021), "MatTransMix: an R package for matrix model-based clustering and parsimonious mixture modeling", doi:10.1007/s00357-021-09401-9.
